name: Combatarium (2 player battle game)
description:
This is a top-down battle game for 2 players with simple controls (move and shoot).

That was a limited-time challenge, I had two days creating the game. I spent extra time for naming the game, adding some sound effects and publishing it.

I you think this game is great, you're wrong. This limited amount of time made me work less on art and doing features without any logic. The game is still fun to play, so nothing feels bad about this. Now it's got an update!

If you wanted to find my other game, this is for you and your friend.

Well, that's all the info you got, enjoy :)

P.S. you don't use a sword in this game, you use a gun
